Tapi::TestPublisher Class Reference

Connect to tapi_core with two publishers who just send some test data once a second. Sends out a Bool and a Float64 message. More...

bool truefalse
 Stores true or false, changes every time SendTest is called. Its value is also sent by SendTest. More...
 

Detailed Description

Connect to tapi_core with two publishers who just send some test data once a second. Sends out a Bool and a Float64 message.

Author
Tobias Holst
Version
1.0.1
